name: Koen Langendoen
content: Koen Langendoen Delft University of Technology Home Publications Bio/CV Teaching Research People Jobs Conferences Prive Koen Langendoen is a full professor of computer science with the EEMCS faculty of TU Delft. He chairs the Embedded Systems group, and serves as the director of studies for the master program on Computer and Embedded-Sytems Engineering. Contact information: Prof. dr. K.G. Langendoen Delft University of Technology Van Mourik Broekmanweg 6 Room: 2.W660 (building 28) 2628 XE Delft Tel: +31 (0)15 2787666 The Netherlands E-mail: K.G.Langendoen@tudelft.nl Face-to-face: Feel free to walk in, but check my schedule first. Or better still, make an appointment through our secretary Pam Lertmeenai. You can safely ignore this very long line, which makes sure that the table formatting is what I want it to be: the menu should be just wide enough and all remaining space should go to the body of the page. last modified: 06-02-2025 12:02:54.0297371370 CET
